content: this legal text is a summary of the progress of a divorce case between mr b and ms c the parties have agreed to proceed with a mutual consent divorce and have made agreements regarding their property children and financial accounts they have also agreed on the distribution of movable property and the allocation of debts the text includes details about the ownership of real estate and the settlement of outstanding loans the parties have retained certain rights and obligations in the event of death the document concludes with a statement that the parties have settled all claims and have retained their respective property the text also confirms the identity of the parties involved and states that the necessary documents have been provided the costs and fees related to the divorce and property acquisition will be divided equally between the parties the divorce will become final once the marriage certificate is notified the agreements made between the parties are binding but do not affect the rights of creditors the document can be accessed online or requested as a physical copy from the notary
